item.title: In the past 1 hour, Ethereum's liquidation volume reached $108 million, while Bitcoin's liquidation volume was only $9.09 million.
item.description: August 13th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 1 hour, the liquidation amount of Ethereum reached $108 million. During the same period, the liquidation amount of Bitcoin was only $9.0968 million.In the past 1 hour, the total network liquidation amount was $139 million, with long liquidations at $6.4965 million and short liquidations at $133 million.In the last 24 hours, a total of 132,703 people worldwide were liquidated, with a total liquidation amount of $502 million. The largest single liquidation took place on OKX - ETH-USDT-SWAP, amounting to $6.8472 million.

item.title: Circle plans to issue 2 million shares of Class A stock, while selling shareholders plan to issue 8 million shares of Class A stock.
item.description: On August 13th, as per a filing with the U.S. SEC, Circle Internet Group intends to issue 2 million shares of Class A stock; the selling shareholders plan to issue 8 million shares of Class A stock.

item.title: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq hit all-time highs as market anticipates Fed rate cut
item.description: August 13th. On Wall Street, there remained a sense of calm. The anticipated inflation data intensified market speculation regarding a Fed rate cut in September. This led to gains in the stock market and a decline in short-term bond yields.The S&P 500 Index witnessed gains across all major sectors, rising by 1.1% and hitting a historical high. The Nasdaq 100 Index also achieved a new all-time high. The Russell 2000 Small-Cap Index increased by 3%. Although the initial upward movement in government bond yields subsided, the money market is currently pricing in a 90% likelihood of a Fed rate cut next month. The two-year Treasury yield, which is more sensitive to upcoming policy changes, fell by 4 basis points to 3.73%.The U.S. dollar weakened. The U.S. core inflation rate rose to its highest level since the start of the year. However, the sluggish growth in commodity prices alleviated concerns about tariff-driven pressures. item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surpasses $4600
item.description: On August 13th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum surged past $4600, witnessing a 24-hour percentage increase of 8.69%.

item.title: US Treasury Secretary: Fed Should Consider Cutting Interest Rates by 50 Basis Points in September
item.description: On August 13th, US Treasury Secretary Yellen proposed that the Fed should take into account a 50-basis-point rate cut in September. (FXStreet)

item.title: Whale Regbil participated in the pump.fun public sale and made a profit of $2.85 million, and had also participated in the XPL public sale.
item.description: August 13th. As per the monitoring by lookonchain, the Whale Address Regbil utilized 6 million USDC through 6 wallets to acquire 1.5 billion PUMP during the public sale on pump.fun. Subsequently, before the price decline, it sold all at 0.0059 USDC, thereby locking in a profit of $2.85 million.Regbil also made a deposit of $11.1 million into Plasma 2 months ago and spent $571,800 to participate in the XPL public sale.

item.title: WCT Surges Over 10% in Short Time, Market Cap Reaches $62 Million
item.description: On August 13th. Possibly because of the "Coinbase to Add WCT to Asset Listing Roadmap" news, WCT witnessed a short-term surge of more than 10%, and its market capitalization reached $62 million.

item.title: Whale @RegbilTrades Banks $2.85M Profit from $PUMP, Selling Before Price Drop
item.description: Whale @RegbilTrades spent 6M $USDC to buy 1.5B $PUMP in the public sale via 6 wallets â€” and smartly sold all of it at $0.0059 before the drop, locking in a $2.85M profit. @RegbilTrades also deposited $11.1M into Plasma(@PlasmaFDN) 2 months ago and spent $571.8K to join the $XPL public sale.

item.title: Andrew Tate has once again increased his position in Block, now holding a total of $150,000 worth of Block.
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of lookonchain, Andrew Tate, a KOL with tens of millions of fans on the X platform, has made a third increase in his holdings of Block. He spent 2.22 ETH (approximately $10,000) to purchase 43,349 Block tokens.In general, Andrew Tate has now spent 32.8 ETH (about $127,000) to acquire 662,682 Block tokens (currently valued at around $150,000), with a current unrealized profit of approximately $23,000.

item.title: Coinbase to Add WCT to Asset Listing Roadmap
item.description: On August 13th, Coinbase declared the inclusion of the WalletConnect Token (WCT) in its asset listing roadmap.
